extendedInfo.description: Customize your live wallpaper with Words of Love dedicated to your loved one.Echo your love or other thoughts on your screen by setting your love words fly over.This Live Wallpaper allows you to type words in three colors and let them randomly fly over your screen background, giving a totally new touch for your phone display. Best used with sweet love words echoed to your loved one, or even installed on his/her Android phone. Valentine love words and thoughts fully supported.You can move words all together to any part of your screen by a finger touch on desired spot, change the speed of words flying and change words density through settings.Keywords: Love, Love words, Love you, spring, spring time, I love you, Loving you, à¤ªà¥à¤¯à¤¾à¤°, à¤ªà¥à¤¯à¤¾à¤° à¤¶à¤¬à¥à¤¦, Heart, Valentine, sweet words, love wallpaper, love live wallpaperOptimized for larger screens (3,7in, 4in, 4,3in..) and tablets, but works nice on any screen size after setting size parameters.Live Wallpaper apps do not appear in your applications. You need to long tap on your background > choose Wallpaper > choose Live Wallpaper > find 3 Words of Love Live WallpaperThis app is free, without hidden ads. Updates are published weekly, so if you ain't lazy, support us with star rating and comments, thanks.
